statements: DELETE FROM routes WHERE starting_location = 'New York' AND destination_location = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM routes WHERE route_id = 15 AND distance_km < 100;
DELETE FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_id = 100 AND origin_location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM location_data WHERE city = 'London' AND country = 'UK'
DELETE FROM locations WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM routes WHERE distance_in_kms > 500)
DELETE FROM routes WHERE route_name = 'Highway to Heaven';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 3 AND fuel_type = 'Diesel';
